content: That's quite a list! I'll definitely check some of those out. I've actually been watching a lot of TV lately, so I might need something to listen to while I'm doing chores or commuting. Speaking of TV, I've been averaging around 4 hours of screen time per day, which is way above my usual. Do you think you could recommend some shows similar to "Stranger Things"? I loved the nostalgic vibe and the mix of sci-fi and mystery.
